Geo_Chest-Weavers_Den: From the Weaversong check, Super Dash left to a hidden breakable wall. Use Fireball to break the wall quickly.
Geo_Rock-Ancestral_Mound_Tree: In the top left of the room, jump up through the light to a hidden alcove.
Geo_Rock-Ancestral_Mound_Tree_Dupe: In the top left of the room, jump up through the light to a hidden alcove.
Geo_Rock-Beast's_Den_Above_Trilobite: From the bench, climb upwards to the second alcove on the right side.
Geo_Rock-Beast's_Den_Above_Trilobite_Dup: From the bench, climb upwards to the second alcove on the right side.
Geo_Rock-Beast's_Den_After_Herrah: From the dreamer check, go past it to the right.
Geo_Rock-Beast's_Den_Below_Egg: From the top of the largest vertical shaft, climb up to an alcove on the right.
Geo_Rock-Beast's_Den_Below_Egg_Dupe: From the top of the largest vertical shaft, climb up to an alcove on the right.
Geo_Rock-Beast's_Den_Below_Herrah: From the dreamer check, go past it to the right. Go down through the breakable floor.
Geo_Rock-Beast's_Den_Bottom: After breaking free, walk to the right and down the second breakable floor.
Geo_Rock-Beast's_Den_Bottom_Dupe: After breaking free, walk to the right and down the second breakable floor.
Geo_Rock-Below_Gorb: In the cave just below Gorb, there is a hidden alcove on the right.
Geo_Rock-Dark_Deepnest_Above_Grub_2: From the top transition, find the spike pit just below. There is a hidden tunnel in the pit.
Geo_Rock-Deepnest_Below_Spike_Grub: The spike pit at the top left of the room has a small hole. There are two checks next to each other.
Geo_Rock-Deepnest_Below_Spike_Grub_Dupe: The spike pit at the top left of the room has a small hole. There are two checks next to each other.
Geo_Rock-Fungal_Above_City_Entrance: From the right transition, climb upwards.
Geo_Rock-Greenpath_Toll_Hidden: There is a breakable wall above the bench/toll and to the left.
Geo_Rock-Greenpath_Toll_Hidden_Dupe: There is a breakable wall above the bench/toll and to the left.
Geo_Rock-Hallownest_Crown_Dive: Go through the breakable Dive floor in the middle of the room.
Geo_Rock-Hallownest_Crown_Dive_Dupe: Go through the breakable Dive floor in the middle of the room.
Geo_Rock-King's_Station: From the lower right transition, climb up through a hidden shaft.
Geo_Rock-Pale_Lurker: From the left transition, drop down, hug the right wall, and dash/jump up to an alcove.
Grub-Basin_Requires_Dive: From the rightmost transition, go left to a pit. At the bottom of the pit is a breakable Dive floor.
Grub-Beast's_Den: From the dreamer check, go past it to the right. Keep going down past the breakable floor.
Grub-Queen's_Gardens_Stag: From the top transition, go all the way left to a hidden alcove.
Hallownest_Seal-Beast's_Den: After breaking free, walk to the right and down the first breakable floor.
Hallownest_Seal-Deepnest_By_Mantis_Lords: At the top and center of the room, there is a hidden tunnel at the very top of the right wall.
Hallownest_Seal-King's_Station: Climb on top of the roof and to the left.
Journal_Entry-Charged_Lumafly: After defeating Uumuu, go down the left side and up from the acid to the second alcove.
Journal_Entry-Garpede: From the top transition, go directly left to a hidden alcove.
King's_Idol-Glade_of_Hope: On the right side, find a hidden alcove at the top of a waterfall.
King's_Idol-Pale_Lurker: From the bottom right of the room, swim through the acid.
Lore_Tablet-Archives_Left: After defeating Uumuu, go down the left side and up from the acid to the third alcove.
Lore_Tablet-Archives_Right: After defeating Uumu, go down the right side to the second alcove.
Lore_Tablet-Archives_Upper: From the top transition (before Uumuu), go downwards while hugging the right side.
Lore_Tablet-Fungal_Wastes_Hidden: From the left transition, climb the left wall. You need Spore Shroom equipped.
Lore_Tablet-Greenpath_Upper_Hidden: From the right transition, get to the top level and jump off to the right.
Lore_Tablet-Palace_Throne: From the King Fragment check/throne, there is a breakable wall all the way to the right.
Lore_Tablet-Sanctum_Past_Soul_Master: At the very top right corner of the room, there is a breakable Dive floor.
Rancid_Egg-Beast's_Den: There is an alcove in a wall on the right side of the room.
Rancid_Egg-Upper_Kingdom's_Edge: Find a large floating strcture around the top right. Inside it is a hidden alcove accessible from below.
Rancid_Egg-Weaver's_Den: From the left transition, walk right, down a pit and to the left.
Soul_Totem-Beast's_Den: The widest vertical shaft has an alcove on the left wall.
Soul_Totem-Below_Xero: There is a breakable wall above the lower left transition.
Soul_Totem-Crossroads_Goam_Journal: From the lower right transition, facing left, there is a breakable wall.
Soul_Totem-Deepnest_Vessel: Before pogo-ing the vertical Garpede, there is a breakable wall on the right.
Soul_Totem-Hallownest_Crown: Go through the breakable Dive floor in the middle of the room.
Soul_Totem-Kingdom's_Edge_Camp: From the upper left transition, jump up two small platforms and jump left to a hidden alcove.
Soul_Totem-Path_of_Pain_Entrance: From the beginning of Path of Pain, Super Dash to the left.
Soul_Totem-Pilgrim's_Way: From the lever check on the middle of the bridge, climb upwards to an alcove.
Unbreakable_Greed: You need Fragile Greed or Unbreakable Greed equipped.
Unbreakable_Heart: You need Fragile Heart or Unbreakable Heart equipped.
Unbreakable_Strength: You need Fragile Strength or Unbreakable Strength equipped.
Vengeful_Spirit: You may need to exhaust Snail Shaman's dialogue.
Wanderer's_Journal-Greenpath_Lower: From the bottom transition, follow the right wall up to a hidden alcove.
Whispering_Root-Ancestral_Mound: In the top left of the room, jump up through the light to a hidden alcove.
